items.title: Composer Arnold Schoenberg's archive destroyed in LA fires
items.description: About 100,000 scores by the Austrian-American composer have been lost in the Pacific Palisade fires.

items.title: Spain plans 100% tax for homes bought by non-EU residents
items.description: The measure is meant to help tackle the country's housing crisis, the prime minister said.

items.title: What we know about the Gaza ceasefire deal
items.description: What we know so far about the possible ceasefire deal being negotiated between Israel and Hamas.

items.title: Relatives wait for news as body bags hauled from South African mine
items.description: Hundreds of people have reportedly been underground since a crackdown on illegal mining began last year.

items.title: Sudan shelling kills more than 100 civilians near capital
items.description: Rescuers say medical supplies are running low as health workers struggle to treat the victims.
